rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.reference-name: Build your own Six Flags Magic Mountain

rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.details: このテーマパークに自身のシックス・フラッグス・パークを作って下さい。
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.name: 自身のシックス・フラッグス・オバー・テキサス
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.reference-details: Starting from scratch, build the rides in this Six Flags park
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.reference-name: Build your own Six Flags over Texas

rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.details: このテーマパークに自身シックス・フラッグス・パークを作って下さい。
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.name: 自身のシックス・フラッグス・パーク
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.reference-details: Build your own design of Six Flags park - either build rides from other Six Flags parks or design and build your own rides
rct2.scenario_text.build_your_own_six_fl.reference-name: Build your own Six Flags Park

rct2.scenario_text.bumbly_bazaar.details: 小さな商店街からスタートし、乗物やローラーコースターで来園客を呼び寄せ、店や売店の利益を増やしてください
rct2.scenario_text.bumbly_bazaar.name: バンブリー商店街
rct2.scenario_text.bumbly_bazaar.reference-details: Starting with a small market bazaar, your challenge is to increase the profit from shops and stalls by building rides and roller coasters to attract more customers

rct2.scenario_text.crazy_castle.details: あなたは、大きな城を相続しました - ここを、小さなテーマパークに造り替えてください.
rct2.scenario_text.crazy_castle.name: クレイジーキャッスル
rct2.scenario_text.crazy_castle.reference-details: You have inherited a large castle. Your job is to convert it into a small theme park.

rct2.scenario_text.dusty_greens.details: 砂漠の中の、高速道路のジャンクションに近いダスティ・グリーンゴルフ場。ここを、人気遊園地にすることができますか
rct2.scenario_text.dusty_greens.name: ダスティ・グリーン
rct2.scenario_text.dusty_greens.reference-details: Situated near a highway junction in the desert, Dusty Greens is an opportunity to develop a small golf resort into a thriving theme park

rct2.scenario_text.electric_fields.details: 小さな農場を相続したあなたに与えられた課題は、畑や農場の建物の間に、小さなテーマパークを造ることです
rct2.scenario_text.electric_fields.name: エレクトリック・フィールド
rct2.scenario_text.electric_fields.reference-details: You have inherited a small farm, and your challenge is to build a small theme park amongst the fields and farm buildings

rct2.scenario_text.extreme_heights.details: 財政上の制限なしで、この砂漠の遊園地を拡張し、究極のスリルを求める人々を呼び寄せてください
rct2.scenario_text.extreme_heights.name: 超高層
rct2.scenario_text.extreme_heights.reference-details: Free of financial restrictions, your challenge is to expand this desert park to attract people seeking the ultimate thrills

rct2.scenario_text.factory_capers.details: 放置された工業コンビナートは、機械風のテーマの遊園地を造るのにうってつけです
rct2.scenario_text.factory_capers.name: ファクトリー・ケイパーズ
rct2.scenario_text.factory_capers.reference-details: An abandoned factory complex is an opportunity to build a mechanical-themed amusement park

rct2.scenario_text.fungus_woods.details: この「キノコの森」では、乗物は昔風の木造のものしか造れません。果たして、あなたはここを人気遊園地にできるでしょうか
rct2.scenario_text.fungus_woods.name: キノコの森
rct2.scenario_text.fungus_woods.reference-details: Restricted to only older-style wooden rides, your challenge is to build a thriving theme park in Fungus Woods

rct2.scenario_text.ghost_town.details: 大遊園地チェーンに雇われたあなたは、この古ぼけた鉱山の町の周りに巨大ローラーコースター遊園地を造らなければなりません
rct2.scenario_text.ghost_town.name: ゴーストタウン
rct2.scenario_text.ghost_town.reference-details: Hired by a large amusement park chain, your task is to build them a giant roller coaster park around an abandoned mining town

rct2.scenario_text.gravity_gardens.details: あなたに与えられた課題は、この美しいグラビティー・ガーデンにローラーコースター遊園地を造ることです - ローラーコースターだけですよ、他の乗物はなしです!
rct2.scenario_text.gravity_gardens.name: グラビティー・ガーデン
rct2.scenario_text.gravity_gardens.reference-details: Your challenge is to build a roller coaster park in the beautiful Gravity Gardens. No other rides, just roller coasters!

rct2.scenario_text.infernal_views.details: すぐ近くを溶岩とマグマが流れる、危険な遊園地です
rct2.scenario_text.infernal_views.name: 地獄絵図
rct2.scenario_text.infernal_views.reference-details: A park nestled precariously on lava rock with streams of magma

rct2.scenario_text.lucky_lake.details: この遊園地では資金は使い放題ですが、湖畔に位置しているので、拡張と経営はきっと困難なものとなるでしょう
rct2.scenario_text.lucky_lake.name: ラッキー・レイク
rct2.scenario_text.lucky_lake.reference-details: With unlimited funds but a challenging lake location, this park will be a challenge to expand and manage

rct2.scenario_text.rainbow_summit.details: 丘の中腹にあるこの遊園地では、いかなる高層建築物も禁止されています。遊園地を拡張し、成功に導くことができるでしょうか
rct2.scenario_text.rainbow_summit.name: レインボーサミット
rct2.scenario_text.rainbow_summit.reference-details: Built on a hillside, this park is forbidden from building anything tall. Can you expand the park and make it successful?

rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_belgium.details: このシックスフラッグス遊園地で、あなたの経営と改良の手腕を見せてください
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_belgium.name: シックスフラッグス・ベルギー
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_belgium.reference-details: Try your hand at running and improving this Six Flags park

rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_great_adven.details: 不足しているシックスフラッグスの乗物を設置するか、またはご自分でオリジナルデザインの乗物を作成して遊園地を改良してください!しかし、本来の最終目標である、遊園地
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_great_adven.name: シックスフラッグス・グレートアドベンチャー
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_great_adven.reference-details: Build the missing Six Flags rides, or create your own designs to improve the park! But don’t forget your ultimate aim: to attract more guests to the park!

rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_holland.details: このシックスフラッグス遊園地で、あなたの経営と改良の手腕を見せてください
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_holland.name: シックスフラッグス・オランダ
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_holland.reference-details: Try your hand at running and improving this Six Flags park

rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_magic_mount.details: 不足しているシックスフラッグスの乗物を設置するか、またはご自分でオリジナルデザインの乗物を作成して遊園地を改良してください!しかし、本来の最終目標である、遊園地
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_magic_mount.name: シックスフラッグス・マジックマウンテン
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_magic_mount.reference-details: Build the missing Six Flags rides, or create your own designs to improve the park! But don’t forget your ultimate aim: to repay your loan while keeping the park value up!

rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_over_texas.details: 不足しているシックスフラッグスの乗物を設置するか、またはご自分でオリジナルデザインの乗物を作成して遊園地を改良してください!しかし、本来の最終目標である、遊園地
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_over_texas.name: シックスフラッグス・オーバーテキサス
rct2.scenario_text.six_flags_over_texas.reference-details: Build the missing Six Flags rides, or create your own designs to improve the park! But don’t forget your ultimate aim: to attract more guests to the park!

rct2tt.ride.cerberus.reference-description: Spacious trains with simple lap restraints with cars shaped like the multi-headed dog from the Underworld

rct2tt.ride.dragnfly.name: とんぼ車両
rct2tt.ride.dragnfly.reference-description: Dragonfly-shaped cars which swing from the rail above

rct2tt.ride.flalmace.reference-description: Riders sit on a themed chair which is attached to a motor driven spinning arm.

rct2tt.ride.flwrpowr.name: フラワーパワーバンパーカー
rct2tt.ride.flwrpowr.reference-description: Riders ride in flower-shaped hovercraft vehicles that they freely control

rct2tt.ride.flygboat.reference-description: Roller coaster cars shaped like flying boats

rct2tt.ride.ganstrcr.name: ギャングスターカー
rct2tt.ride.ganstrcr.reference-description: 1920s-themed gangster cars are accelerated out of the station by linear induction motors to speed through twisting inversions

rct2tt.ride.halofmrs.reference-description: Building containing warped mirrors which distort the reflection of the viewer

rct2tt.ride.pegasusx.reference-description: Powered vehicles in the shape of Pegasus drawing a cart

rct2tt.ride.polchase.description: 垂直ループが可能な、膝の安全バーが付いたパトロールカーのようなローラーコースターです
rct2tt.ride.polchase.name: パトカー型トレイン
rct2tt.ride.polchase.reference-description: Roller coaster trains with lap bars capable of travelling through vertical loops, themed to look like police cars

rct2tt.ride.policecr.description: 特殊な反転ターンがある木製のコースを1920年代のパトカーが走行するコースターです
rct2tt.ride.policecr.name: パトカー
rct2tt.ride.policecr.reference-description: 1920s-themed police cars run on wooden tracks, turning around on special reversing sections

rct2tt.ride.pterodac.description: コースの下にある快適な座席に座り、究極の先史時代の飛行体験が楽しめるコースターです
rct2tt.ride.pterodac.name: プテロダクティルス・トレイン
rct2tt.ride.pterodac.reference-description: Riders are held in comfortable seats below the track to give the ultimate prehistoric flying experience

rct2tt.ride.raptorxx.description: シングルレールコースをラプタ形の車両が走行する乗物です
rct2tt.ride.raptorxx.name: ラプタ・レース

rct2tt.ride.rivrstyx.description: 黄泉の国をテーマにしたボートが、ゆるやかに曲がりくねった川のコースを進む乗物です
rct2tt.ride.rivrstyx.name: 三途の川ボート
rct2tt.ride.rivrstyx.reference-description: Boats with an Underworld theme, built for flat river tracks

rct2tt.ride.schoolbs.description: 北アメリカのスクールバスをテーマにしたミニチュアトラムです
rct2tt.ride.schoolbs.name: スクールバストラム
rct2tt.ride.schoolbs.reference-description: Miniature trams themed to look like North American school buses

rct2tt.ride.seaplane.description: ぶら下がった水上飛行機型の車両が大きく揺れ動くコースターです
rct2tt.ride.seaplane.name: 水上飛行機車両
rct2tt.ride.seaplane.reference-description: Suspended roller coaster trains consisting of seaplane-shaped cars able to swing freely as the train goes around corners

rct2tt.ride.softoyst.description: 可愛い恐竜のぬいぐるみを売っているお店です
rct2tt.ride.softoyst.name: ぬいぐるみ屋
rct2tt.ride.softoyst.reference-description: A stall selling a cute soft toy dinosaur

rct2tt.ride.spokprsn.description: 不気味な地下牢や投獄された者たちのマネキンがいるお化け屋敷です
rct2tt.ride.spokprsn.name: お化け屋敷
rct2tt.ride.spokprsn.reference-description: Building containing dungeons and mannequins of incarcerated figures, to scare people walking through it

rct2tt.ride.stamphrd.description: 猛威を振るう恐竜の群れをテーマにした、立ち乗りのローラーコースターです
rct2tt.ride.stamphrd.name: 押し寄せる恐竜の群れトレイン
rct2tt.ride.stamphrd.reference-description: Roller coaster trains in which the riders ride in a standing position, themed to look like a stampeding dinosaur herd

rct2tt.ride.telepter.description: テレポーテーションのような錯覚を与える未来的なエレベーターキャビン
rct2tt.ride.telepter.name: テレポーターキャビン
rct2tt.ride.telepter.reference-description: Futuristic lift cabin that gives guests the illusion of teleportation

rct2tt.ride.timemach.description: ゲストは特別に設計されたポッドで、タイムトラベルのような錯覚を体験します
rct2tt.ride.timemach.name: タイムマシン
rct2tt.ride.timemach.reference-description: Guests sit in a specially designed sphere, and experience the illusion of time travel

rct2tt.ride.tommygun.description: 大きな機関銃のレプリカの周りをペアシートが回る乗物です
rct2tt.ride.tommygun.name: 小型機関銃ツイスター
rct2tt.ride.tommygun.reference-description: Riders ride in pairs of themed seats which rotate around a large replica Tommy Gun

rct2tt.ride.trebucht.description: 暗黒時代の攻城兵器をもとにした、大きな２つのアームからぶら下がったゴンドラが前後・上下に回転する乗物です
rct2tt.ride.trebucht.name: 投石機ライド
rct2tt.ride.trebucht.reference-description: Passengers ride in a carriage suspended by two large arms, based on a Dark Age siege weapon

rct2tt.ride.tricatop.description: トリケラトプス形のバンパーカーに乗り、互いにぶつけ合う乗物です
rct2tt.ride.tricatop.name: トリケラトプス・バンパーカー
rct2tt.ride.tricatop.reference-description: Riders lock horns with each other in triceratops dodgems

rct2tt.ride.trilobte.description: 三葉虫の型のローラーコースター車両です
rct2tt.ride.trilobte.name: 三葉虫ボート

rct2tt.ride.valkyrie.description: ワルキューレをモチーフにした、垂直落下が可能な幅広車両のローラーコースターです
rct2tt.ride.valkyrie.name: ヴァルキリー・トレイン
rct2tt.ride.valkyrie.reference-description: Valkyries-themed roller coaster trains with extra-wide cars, built for vertical drops

rct2tt.ride.zeplelin.description: ツェッペリンの形をした大定員のモノレールです
rct2tt.ride.zeplelin.name: ツェッペリン車両
rct2tt.ride.zeplelin.reference-description: Large capacity themed monorail trains with streamlined front and rear cars

rct2tt.scenario_text.alcatraz.details: The infamous Prison Island - whose population once swelled with bootleggers and racketeers - is now up for sale. You’ve decided to convert it into a top tourist attraction, and money is no object
rct2tt.scenario_text.alcatraz.name: アルカトラズ
rct2tt.scenario_text.alcatraz.reference-details: The infamous Prison Island - whose population once swelled with bootleggers and racketeers - is now up for sale. You’ve decided to convert it into a top tourist attraction, and money is no object

rct2tt.scenario_text.animatronic_antics.details: You have been given the task of running and improving an existing theme park, which has been built on an old film set. Build a tribute to the pioneering stop-motion animators who first brought mythical creatures to life on the silver screen.
rct2tt.scenario_text.animatronic_antics.name: アニマトロ・アンティクス
rct2tt.scenario_text.animatronic_antics.park_name: アニマトロ・アンティクス
rct2tt.scenario_text.animatronic_antics.reference-details: You have been given the task of running and improving an existing theme park, which has been built on an old film set. Build a tribute to the pioneering stop-motion animators who first brought mythical creatures to life on the silver screen.

rct2tt.scenario_text.cliffside_castle.details: Local members of the battle re-enactment society are rather serious about their hobby. They’ve entrusted you with the job of constructing a Dark Age theme park on the grounds of Cliffside Castle.
rct2tt.scenario_text.cliffside_castle.name: 崖側の城
rct2tt.scenario_text.cliffside_castle.reference-details: Local members of the battle re-enactment society are rather serious about their hobby. They’ve entrusted you with the job of constructing a Dark Age theme park on the grounds of Cliffside Castle.

rct2tt.scenario_text.coastersaurus.details: You’ve been given the task of constructing a Jurassic era theme park. To optimize your visitors’ access to the exotic plant and animal exhibits, you will need to build rides going over and into the valley.
rct2tt.scenario_text.coastersaurus.name: コースターサウルス
rct2tt.scenario_text.coastersaurus.reference-details: You’ve been given the task of constructing a Jurassic era theme park. To optimize your visitors’ access to the exotic plant and animal exhibits, you will need to build rides going over and into the valley.

rct2tt.scenario_text.crater_carnage.details: You own a dusty old meteor crater. In the true entrepreneurial spirit, you’ve decided to construct an asteroid theme park and convert your seemingly worthless land into a sizeable fortune.
rct2tt.scenario_text.crater_carnage.name: クレーターの大虐殺
rct2tt.scenario_text.crater_carnage.reference-details: You own a dusty old meteor crater. In the true entrepreneurial spirit, you’ve decided to construct an asteroid theme park and convert your seemingly worthless land into a sizeable fortune.

rct2tt.scenario_text.extraterrestrial_ex.details: Life has been discovered on a distant planet Build an alien theme park to cash in on the unprecedented wave of interest.
rct2tt.scenario_text.extraterrestrial_ex.name: 地球外な壮観
rct2tt.scenario_text.extraterrestrial_ex.reference-details: Life has been discovered on a distant planet Build an alien theme park to cash in on the unprecedented wave of interest.

rct2tt.scenario_text.gemini_city.details: Show off your inventive, utopian vision of the future - come up with a futuristic park design that incorporates state-of-the-art attractions.
rct2tt.scenario_text.gemini_city.name: ジェミニ・シティ
rct2tt.scenario_text.gemini_city.reference-details: Show off your inventive, utopian vision of the future - come up with a futuristic park design that incorporates state-of-the-art attractions.

rct2tt.scenario_text.metropolis.details: You own an empty lot near the low-rise part of town. To squeeze the most out of your urban property, build a skyscraper theme park inspired by the soaring art deco architecture of the twenties.
rct2tt.scenario_text.metropolis.name: メトロポリス
rct2tt.scenario_text.metropolis.reference-details: You own an empty lot near the low-rise part of town. To squeeze the most out of your urban property, build a skyscraper theme park inspired by the soaring art deco architecture of the twenties.

rct2tt.scenario_text.mythological_madnes.details: You own an island of particular archaeological value. You’ve decided to fund its preservation by constructing a theme park based on the area’s rich Mythological heritage.
rct2tt.scenario_text.mythological_madnes.name: 神話の狂気
rct2tt.scenario_text.mythological_madnes.reference-details: You own an island of particular archaeological value. You’ve decided to fund its preservation by constructing a theme park based on the area’s rich Mythological heritage.

rct2tt.scenario_text.rock_n_roll_revival.details: This aging theme park has seen better days. Help the owner give it a retro rock ’n’ roll makeover and turn the place into a successful venue.
rct2tt.scenario_text.rock_n_roll_revival.name: ロックンロール・リバイバル
rct2tt.scenario_text.rock_n_roll_revival.park_name: ロックンロール・リバイバル
rct2tt.scenario_text.rock_n_roll_revival.reference-details: This aging theme park has seen better days. Help the owner give it a retro rock ‘n’ roll makeover and turn the place into a successful venue.

rct2tt.scenario_text.rocky_rambles.details: To thwart the highway developers and preserve the mysterious ancient stone circles, you will need to construct a Stone Age theme park and turn a profit. However, attracting visitors may pose a challenge, as the terrain is a tad inhospitable.
rct2tt.scenario_text.rocky_rambles.name: ロッキー・ランブル
rct2tt.scenario_text.rocky_rambles.reference-details: To thwart the highway developers and preserve the mysterious ancient stone circles, you will need to construct a Stone Age theme park and turn a profit. However, attracting visitors may pose a challenge, as the terrain is a tad inhospitable.

rct2tt.scenario_text.schneider_shores.details: The 75th anniversary of your grandfather’s Schneider Cup victory is coming up in a few years. You’re going to honour his achievement by building a theme park based on the famous seaplane race.
rct2tt.scenario_text.schneider_shores.name: シュナイダー・ショーズ
rct2tt.scenario_text.schneider_shores.park_name: シュナイダー・ショーズ
rct2tt.scenario_text.schneider_shores.reference-details: The 75th anniversary of your grandfather’s Schneider Cup victory is coming up in a few years. You’re going to honour his achievement by building a theme park based on the famous seaplane race.

rct2tt.scenario_text.sherwood_forest.details: To liberate wealth from the rich and distribute it to the needy, you and your Merry Men have decided to build a theme park in Sherwood Forest.
rct2tt.scenario_text.sherwood_forest.name: シャーウッドの森
rct2tt.scenario_text.sherwood_forest.reference-details: To liberate wealth from the rich and distribute it to the needy, you and your Merry Men have decided to build a theme park in Sherwood Forest.

rct2tt.scenario_text.woodstock.details: A large annual music festival takes place on your land. Build a hip theme park to keep the free-spirited audience entertained.

rct2tt.scenario_text.woodstock.reference-details: A large annual music festival takes place on your land. Build a hip theme park to keep the free-spirited audience entertained.

rct2ww.scenario_text.ayers_adventure.details: You are helping Aboriginal people to build a park as part of a cultural awareness program. You need to get a large number of guests to educate them in the unique heritage of the Aboriginal people.
rct2ww.scenario_text.ayers_adventure.name: エアーズ・アドベンチャー
rct2ww.scenario_text.ayers_adventure.park_name: エアーズ・アドベンチャー
rct2ww.scenario_text.ayers_adventure.reference-details: You are helping Aboriginal people to build a park as part of a cultural awareness program. You need to get a large number of guests to educate them in the unique heritage of the Aboriginal people.

rct2ww.scenario_text.beach_barbecue_blas.details: A local entrepreneur’s sealife park has gone bust. You already operate a small park and buy the other park from the construction company. Develop a big combined park.
rct2ww.scenario_text.beach_barbecue_blas.name: ビーチ・バーベキュー
rct2ww.scenario_text.beach_barbecue_blas.park_name: ビーチ・バーベキュー
rct2ww.scenario_text.beach_barbecue_blas.reference-details: A local entrepreneur’s sealife park has gone bust. You already operate a small park and buy the other park from the construction company. Develop a big combined park.

rct2ww.scenario_text.canyon_calamities.details: You have to build a park on limited land either side of this natural treasure - you do have the opportunity to buy neighbouring land from the Native American Indians. You need to complete the objective to sustain the local town’s population.
rct2ww.scenario_text.canyon_calamities.name: キャニオン・カラミティー
rct2ww.scenario_text.canyon_calamities.park_name: キャニオン・カラミティー
rct2ww.scenario_text.canyon_calamities.reference-details: You have to build a park on limited land either side of this natural treasure - you do have the opportunity to buy neighbouring land from the Native American Indians. You need to complete the objective to sustain the local town’s population.

rct2ww.scenario_text.european_extravagan.details: You have been brought in to take over a European Cultural Visitor Attraction and must increase the number of guests in order to pay back the EU subsidy by the end of the current European parliament term.
rct2ww.scenario_text.european_extravagan.name: ヨーロッパ文化祭
rct2ww.scenario_text.european_extravagan.reference-details: You have been brought in to take over a European Cultural Visitor Attraction and must increase the number of guests in order to pay back the EU subsidy by the end of the current European parliament term.

rct2ww.scenario_text.from_the_ashes.details: An old park has fallen into disrepair. You gain a European Union grant to return this deprived area to its former glory! You need to renovate the park and repay the grant.
rct2ww.scenario_text.from_the_ashes.name: 灰の中から
rct2ww.scenario_text.from_the_ashes.reference-details: An old park has fallen into disrepair. You gain a European Union grant to return this deprived area to its former glory! You need to renovate the park and repay the grant.

rct2ww.scenario_text.great_wall_of_china.details: The authorities have decided to enhance tourism around the Great Wall by building a theme park on the adjacent land. Money is no object!
rct2ww.scenario_text.great_wall_of_china.name: 万里の長城
rct2ww.scenario_text.great_wall_of_china.reference-details: The authorities have decided to enhance tourism around the Great Wall by building a theme park on the adjacent land. Money is no object!

rct2ww.scenario_text.icy_adventures.details: The environment agency has turned to you to transform an old oil refinery ecological eyesore into a top tourist attraction. Land is cheap but loan interest is high. You can sell the old buildings for salvage.
rct2ww.scenario_text.icy_adventures.name: 氷の冒険
rct2ww.scenario_text.icy_adventures.reference-details: The environment agency has turned to you to transform an old oil refinery ecological eyesore into a top tourist attraction. Land is cheap but loan interest is high. You can sell the old buildings for salvage.

rct2ww.scenario_text.lost_city_founder.details: To further boost local tourism you must construct a park that is in tune with its surroundings, and has height restrictions.
rct2ww.scenario_text.lost_city_founder.name: ロスト・シティ
rct2ww.scenario_text.lost_city_founder.reference-details: To further boost local tourism you must construct a park that is in tune with its surroundings.

rct2ww.scenario_text.mines_of_africa.details: You inherited a disused diamond mine, and find a valuable diamond.  You decide to invest that money to build a world-famous theme park.
rct2ww.scenario_text.mines_of_africa.name: アフリカの鉱山
rct2ww.scenario_text.mines_of_africa.reference-details: You inherited a disused diamond mine, and find a valuable diamond.  You decide to invest that money to build a world-famous theme park.

rct2ww.scenario_text.mirage_madness.details: A desert Oasis has been discovered and would provide a beautiful location for a park. Transport to the oasis has been provided.
rct2ww.scenario_text.mirage_madness.name: ミラージュ・マッドネス
rct2ww.scenario_text.mirage_madness.park_name: ミラージュ・マッドネス
rct2ww.scenario_text.mirage_madness.reference-details: A desert Oasis has been discovered and would provide a beautiful location for a park. Transport to the oasis has been provided.

rct2ww.scenario_text.okinawa_coast.details: An existing park has run out of space. Your only option is to build out into the sea, and so you have taken out a loan. Height restrictions on your building are enforced due to foundations and earthquake risk.
rct2ww.scenario_text.okinawa_coast.name: 沖縄海岸
rct2ww.scenario_text.okinawa_coast.reference-details: An existing park has run out of space. Your only option is to build out into the sea, and so you have taken out a loan. Height restrictions on your building are enforced due to foundations and earthquake risk.

rct2ww.scenario_text.over_the_edge.details: A dam has been built offering abundant, cheap hydroelectric power with which to run a park. You need to reach a high park value to help repay the loan for the dam.
rct2ww.scenario_text.over_the_edge.name: オーバー・ザ・エッジ
rct2ww.scenario_text.over_the_edge.park_name: オーバー・ザ・エッジ
rct2ww.scenario_text.over_the_edge.reference-details: A dam has been built offering abundant, cheap hydroelectric power with which to run a park. You need to reach a high park value to help repay the loan for the dam.

rct2ww.scenario_text.park_maharaja.details: You have been commissioned by the Maharaja to bring entertainment to the large local population. Build a park inspired by the Maharaja’s palace.
rct2ww.scenario_text.park_maharaja.name: パーク・マハラジャ
rct2ww.scenario_text.park_maharaja.reference-details: You have been commissioned by the Maharaja to bring entertainment to the large local population. Build a park inspired by the Maharaja’s palace.

rct2ww.scenario_text.rainforest_romp.details: Space is limited in the precious rainforest - you must cram as much as possible into the existing clearing, in order to provide a viable alternative to the local timber industry.
rct2ww.scenario_text.rainforest_romp.name: 熱帯雨林高原
rct2ww.scenario_text.rainforest_romp.reference-details: Space is limited in the precious rainforest - you must cram as much as possible into the existing clearing, in order to provide a viable alternative to the local timber industry.

rct2ww.scenario_text.rollercoaster_heave.details: You are a successful business tycoon on long sabbatical who desires to use this time transforming the city park into Rollercoaster Heaven. Money is no object!
rct2ww.scenario_text.rollercoaster_heave.name: ジェットコースター天国
rct2ww.scenario_text.rollercoaster_heave.park_name: ジェットコースター天国
rct2ww.scenario_text.rollercoaster_heave.reference-details: You are a successful business tycoon on long sabbatical who desires to use this time transforming the city park into Rollercoaster Heaven. Money is no object!

rct2ww.scenario_text.sugarloaf_shores.details: You run a small park near Rio but the bank has called in your loan. You need to quickly increase your earning capacity to repay this unexpected debt.
rct2ww.scenario_text.sugarloaf_shores.name: シュガーローフ・ショアーズ
rct2ww.scenario_text.sugarloaf_shores.park_name: シュガーローフ・ショアーズ
rct2ww.scenario_text.sugarloaf_shores.reference-details: You run a small park near Rio but the bank has called in your loan. You need to quickly increase your earning capacity to repay this unexpected debt.

rct2ww.scenario_text.wacky_waikiki.details: The people of Hawaii are bored of surfing and are looking for something more intense. You need to build a park with this in mind to keep the area’s tourist attraction rating high.
rct2ww.scenario_text.wacky_waikiki.name: ワッキー・ワイキキ
rct2ww.scenario_text.wacky_waikiki.reference-details: The people of Hawaii are bored of surfing and are looking for something more intense. You need to build a park with this in mind to keep the area’s tourist attraction rating high.

uces.scenario_text.cemetery_ridge.details: This is Halloween, UCES Halloween, pumpkins scream in the dead of night! This graveyard is in trouble and it’s up to you to save it, while letting the dead rest in peace! Can you keep the ghosts in their graves and bring chills to your customers?

This graveyard is in trouble and it’s up to you to save it, while letting the dead rest in peace! Can you keep the ghosts in their graves and bring chills to your customers?

uces.scenario_text.rocky_mountain_miners.name: Rocky Mountain Miners
uces.scenario_text.rocky_mountain_miners.reference-details: A rockslide damaged your railway. Your workers have gone prospecting. Is there gold in roller coasters?

uces.scenario_text.sand_dune.details: As the owner of a small park, you bought a large piece of land along the beach to expand and attract more guests to visit the beautiful sand dunes, but beware: you cannot disturb those ecologically fragile sand dunes.
uces.scenario_text.sand_dune.name: Sand Dune
uces.scenario_text.sand_dune.reference-details: As the owner of a small park, you bought a large piece of land along the beach to expand and attract more guests to visit the beautiful sand dunes, but beware: you cannot disturb those ecologically fragile sand dunes.

uces.scenario_text.the_lighthouse_of_ale.details: Alexander built the city; Greeks, Romans, Egyptians left their mark. But the biggest honor was a Wonder of the Ancient World - the Lighthouse. Visit and make a park!
uces.scenario_text.the_lighthouse_of_ale.name: The Lighthouse of Alexandria
uces.scenario_text.the_lighthouse_of_ale.reference-details: Alexander built the city; Greeks, Romans, Egyptians left their mark. But the biggest honor was a Wonder of the Ancient World - the Lighthouse. Visit and make a park!

uces.scenario_text.the_sandbox.details: What everyone wants - a sandbox! So grab your l’il pail and shovel and build a park!
uces.scenario_text.the_sandbox.name: The Sandbox
uces.scenario_text.the_sandbox.reference-details: What everyone wants - a sandbox! So grab your l’il pail and shovel and build a park!

uces.scenario_text.the_time_machine.details: The Time Machine. Build to go - when you want, where you want. Eternity awaits. It’s all relative.
uces.scenario_text.the_time_machine.name: The Time Machine
uces.scenario_text.the_time_machine.reference-details: The Time Machine. Build to go - when you want, where you want. Eternity awaits. It’s all relative.

uces.scenario_text.tower_of_babel.details: Whoaa! Look where the time machine took us now! Where did everybody go?
uces.scenario_text.tower_of_babel.name: Tower of Babel
uces.scenario_text.tower_of_babel.reference-details: Whoaa! Look where the time machine took us now! Where did everybody go?

uces.scenario_text.urbis_incognitus.details: The Romans are tired of boring gladiator fights. Give them a better thrill, turn a Roman city into the greatest amusement park of all time!
uces.scenario_text.urbis_incognitus.name: Urbis Incognitus
uces.scenario_text.urbis_incognitus.reference-details: The Romans are tired of boring gladiator fights. Give them a better thrill, turn a Roman city into the greatest amusement park of all time!
